entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:27 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or ice pellets beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High 7. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 8. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
